tests.name: Test GapBuffer create
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Gap.Creating"

tests.name: Test GapBuffer inserting
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Gap.Insert"

tests.name: Test GapBuffer set cursor 1
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Gap.Setcursor1"

tests.name: Test GapBuffer set cursor 2
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Gap.Setcursor2"

tests.name: Test GapBuffer remove
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Gap.Remove"

tests.name: Test GapBuffer to string
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Gap.ToString"

tests.name: Test GapBuffer length
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Gap.Length"

tests.name: Test GapBuffer break
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Gap.Break"

tests.name: Test Document create
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Document.Create"

tests.name: Test Document InsertAfter 1
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Document.InsertAfter1"

tests.name: Test Document InsertAfter 2
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Document.InsertAfter2"

tests.name: Test Document InsertBefore
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Document.InsertBefore"

tests.name: Test Document Remove
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=Document.Remove"

tests.name: Test DocumentIO Read
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=DocumentIO.Read"

tests.name: Test DocumentIO Write
tests.run: docker run --rm test_wee /bin/bash -c "make clean; make test-build; ./test_wee --gtest_filter=DocumentIO.Write"
